patient_name.description: patient name ... required if the use is not authenticated

date.description: the booking date ... date format is: Y-m-d

message.description: the message that will be displayed to the user

type.description: is this notification is just a normal notification or it's an offer notification?

is_read.description: mark the notification as read ... note that: to mark the notification as read you have to send this property only and don't include other properties

points.description: to add points to the answer

same_page.description: will the survey be on the same page or in another page? (if same_page=false you will have to send the slug property)
